coreAttributes.name: BR14
coreAttributes.description: A select-fire battle rifle, capable of both semi and fully automatic fire modes, and taking 20-round detachable box magazines of 7.62Ã—51mm NATO ammunition. The gas-operated firing mechanism utilises a rotating bolt, and is capable of producing a fire rate of around 700-750 RPM.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Use your BR14 to fire a single bullet at your target.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] out [npc.her] BR14, inserts a magazine, and pulls the charging handle, putting it into a state where it's ready to be used in combat.

hitDescriptions.hitText:
Taking aim with [npc.her] BR14, [npc.name] [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger and [npc.verb(fire)] a bullet at [npc2.name], hitting [npc2.herHim] directly in the chest!
Thankfully, there seems to be some kind of arcane force preventing [npc2.name] from being seriously wounded or killed...

missDescriptions.missText: Taking aim with [npc.her] BR14, [npc.name] [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger and fires a bullet at [npc2.name], but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
